meanings.definition: (ラテン語) 助ける、救済する、援助する
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) to run to help, to assist, to aid, to relieve

examples.translation: 危険な状態にある誰かを助ける。

etymology.value: ラテン語の「sub-」（下に、近くに）+「currere」（走る）から構成される。文字通りには「走って近づく」という意味合いで、助けを必要とする人のところに駆けつけるイメージ。

verb_forms.present_indicative: succurro, succurris, succurrit, succurrimus, succurritis, succurrunt
verb_forms.imperfect_indicative: succurrebam, succurrebas, succurrebat, succurrebamus, succurrebatis, succurrebant
verb_forms.future_indicative: succurram, succurres, succurret, succurremus, succurretis, succurrent
verb_forms.perfect_indicative: succurri, succurristi, succurrit, succurrimus, succurristis, succurrerunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_indicative: succurreram, succurreras, succurrerat, succurreramus, succurreratis, succurrerant
verb_forms.future_perfect_indicative: succursero, succurseris, succurserit, succurserimus, succurseritis, succurserint
verb_forms.present_subjunctive: succurram, succurras, succurrat, succurramus, succurratis, succurrant
verb_forms.imperfect_subjunctive: succurrerem, succurreres, succurreret, succurreremus, succurreretis, succurrerent
verb_forms.perfect_subjunctive: succurri, succurris, succurrit, succurrimus, succurris, succurrunt
verb_forms.pluperfect_subjunctive: succurrissem, succurrisses, succurrisset, succurrissemus, succurrissetis, succurrissent

inflection.notes: ラテン語の動詞は活用が複雑です。上記は主要な活用形の一部です。

usage_notes.explanation: 「succurrere」は、困っている人や危険な状態にある人に、迅速に助けの手を差し伸べることを意味する動詞です。現代語の「succor」（救済、援助）の語源となっています。

derivatives: succursor (名詞: 援助者、救済者)

level_frequency.frequency_google_ngram: 低頻度 (Low frequency) - 古典ラテン語の語彙。

readability_explanation.text: 「Succurrere」は古典ラテン語の動詞で、現代の英語や他の言語では直接的な対応語が少ないため、一般的な読者には馴染みが薄いかもしれません。しかし、英語の「succor」という単語の語源であることを知っておくと、意味を理解しやすくなります。

example_sentences.translation: あなたは私を助けなければならない！
神が我々を助けてくださいますように！
